content.rendered:
Directed by Shoojit Sircar

Written by Wajid Shaikh

Cast Varun Dhawan (Danish Walia). Banita Sandhu (Shiuli Iyer). Gitanjali Rao (Prof. Vidya Iyer). Sahil Vedoliyaa (Manjeet). Isha Chaturvedi (Ishani). Prateek Kapoor (Asthana). Iteeva Pandey (Kaveri). Karamveer Kanwar (Kunal). Ashish Ghosh(Dr. Ghosh). Rachica Oswal (Danish’s Mother) . Aarti (Ambulance Nurse). Gauri Aggarwal (Girl Kid (twins)). Rajesh Aggarwal (Fellow cook in the kitchen). Alex (Hotel Intern). Nikita Anand (Akash Sarin’s wife). Anmol (Hotel Intern). Nilanjana Banerjee (Team Doctor 1). Shishendu Banerjee (Hotel Senior Manager). Raunak Barua (Junior Doctor Staff). Caroline (Hotel Intern). Raaf Chaudhary (Khan). Chiranjit Das (Bio waste collection staff). Nikhil Dewan (Laundry Senior). Aditi Dogra (Aditi Dogra – Big weeding family – wife). Eran (Hotel Intern). Gautam (Body Double – Varun Dhawan). Mala Gopal (Head Nurse 2). Bikram Gupta (Hospital Accountant). Dr. Himanshu (Ambulance Dr. 1). Jahir Islam (Rohan ahmed). Manish Jain (Hospital Dhabewala). Tushar Jain (Ambulance Dr. 2). Javed (Neuro ICU – Guard). Arun Kalra (Hospital Executive – nurse staff). Vipin Katyal (Chaudhari – Hospital night watchman). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Rajveer Khanna (Akash Sarin). Navya Khurana (Kid 1). Ekaansh Kukreja (Kid 2). Yashas Kukreja (Kid 3). Naresh Kumar (Parking Security Guard). Sister Liki (Junior Doctor Staff). Maaz (Hotel Intern). Papori Medhi (Maajda (Maid)). Gaurav Mehta (Banquet Manager). Parvez Patwary Milon (Milon). Debabrata Mukhopadhyay (Neuro Surgeon – O.T (as Dr. Debabrata Mukhopadhyay)). Shekhar Murugan (Jairam Iyer). Mustakeen (Carpenter (making the slope)). Sister Namrata (Junior Doctor Staff). Monisha Narang(Physiotherapist). Rahul Nigam (Staff Person – Canteen fight). Helena Ovung(Beautician). Rabiya (Junior Doctor Staff). Piyush Raina (Big weeding family – husband). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). Namrata Rani (Home Nurse). Nimmi Raphael (Sister Grace). S.M. Abbas Rizvi (Pharmacy customer). Rohit (Police officer – Hospital Inquiry). Mishele Samrat (Hotel Intern). Arsh Parminder Shah(Hospital Clerk). Ritu Sharda (Lady Dr. – GCS Specialist). Kanika Sharma (Junior Doctor Staff). Prashant Sharma (Junior Doctor Staff). Mohammed Shoeb (Hotel General Manager). Nanaki Singh(Kaver’s friend). Parminder Shah Singh(Hospital Clerk). Prabhjot Singh(Sardar Chemist). Sudeep Singh(Team Doctor 2). Vihaan Singhal (Kid 5 (Rohit)). Skaterrboyy20(Hotel owner). Poonam Solanki (Team Doctor 3 (as Dr. Poonam Solanki)). Anshul Thakur (ADI). Kumar Thakur (Night hospital messanger). Priya Thakur (Larisa Resort Owner – Manali). Vibhuti Tomar (Hospital Receptionist). Jai Uday (Kid 4). Lee Westwick (Hotel Guest)

Languages Hindi

Producers Ashish Dixit. Hetvi Karia. Sheel Kumar. Ronnie Lahiri. Kumar Thakur

Production Kino Work. NH Studio. Rising Sun Film
